title: GoHighLevel Account Expert
job_overview:
Hello, 

We're looking to bring on a few GoHighLevel experts on our team. 

We have a system where you'll be working per account. Each account will include:
- GHL Website Template (4 pages)
- Setting up to 2-3 Automations
- Sales Pipeline build out
- Calendar bookings
- Form build outs
And sometimes
- Assisting with A2P or porting
- Integrations
etc. 

We look to finish deliverables within 10-14 days. 

You'll be paid per account of $50. Each account should take about 3-8 hours to complete. The client will work on copywriting and polishing everything up. 

With ongoing client support we offer $10/mo per account. 

We're currently running ads and are closing 3-5 clients a week. 
Potential to make $1,000/mo - part time. 

Looking forward from hearing about your experience and to see if this is a good fit.
